points.title: Very broad copyright license on your content, includes right for Delicious to distribute through any media
points.status: The copyright license granted to Delicious is not limited to operating the service. Your content can be exploited “in any and all media or distribution channels (now known or hereafter created)” i.e. it can be distributed by Delicious outside the Delicious service.

points.title: Non-transparent use of cookies and third party ads
points.status: Data collected with cookies is kept for an undefined period of time. Also, Delicious' “Third party advertisers may also place or read cookies on your browser.”

points.title: Only for personal and non-commercial use
points.status: Your use of the service is restricted with “a limited license to access, share, tag and save to your Account any Member Content (including another Member's public “bookmarks”) for your personal and non-commercial use”.

points.title: https is not used by default
points.status: When you visit the website over http, you are not redirected to https.

points.title: No Right to leave the service
points.status: Even if you terminate your account, Delicious “may retain an archived copy for legitimate business purposes”. The copyright license does not end.

points.title: Your personal information are an asset for business transfers
points.status: Delicious “may sell, transfer or otherwise share some or all of its assets, including your Personal Information, in connection with a merger, acquisition, reorganization or sale of assets or in the event of bankruptcy.”

points.title: [bad] delicious new terms 5. third party services get access to personal information
points.status: Third parties have access to your Personal Information only to perform certain tasks on behalf of Delicious and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.
